short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides additional features to BitcoinTalk.org using data from BPIP.org

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enhances BitcoinTalk forum by adding links to BitcoinTalk Public Information Project (BPIP) and providing optional features such as showing user status.
